mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, id, name, dep, position from ( select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and m.pno!=9 order by id desc ) ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and m.pno!=9 and
name like '%'||#{search}||'%' (name like '%'||#{search}||'%' or dep like '%'||#{search}||'%')
order by id desc
select id, name, dep, position, m.pno, manager, tel, phone from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, dep, pno, manager, tel, phone) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{dep}, #{pno}, #{manager}, #{tel}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update member set tel=#{tel}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select pw from member where id=#{id}
select id, name, dep, position from member m, memberPosition mp where m.pno=mp.pno and m.pno!=9 order by dep asc, m.pno desc
